bibl.title: Military Orders for Valery Havard, April 23, 1900

div1.p: Havard is announced as Chief Surgeon of the Division. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Military Orders for Valery Havard, April 23, 1900
div1.opener:
ORDERS, BOOKS, BLANKS & D.C.unclear
A. G. O.
RECD. MAY 7 1900
B K
ED: RETURNS, A. G. O.
. . 9
FROM THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES
Havard
GENERAL ORDERS,
No. 10.}
HEADQUARTERS DIVISION OF CUBA,
Havana, April 23, 1900.
div1.p:
Major Valery Havard, Medical Department, U. S. Army,
having reported at these Headquarters in compliance with
paragraph 20, Special Orders No. 77, current series, Head-
quarters of the Army, is hereby announced as Chief Surgeon
of the Division.
div1.closer:
BY COMMAND OF MAJOR GENERAL WOOD:
W.V. Richards Adjutant General.
Vol 175 A 1900
